root.name: Outlaws: Handful of Missions
root.description: Handful of Missions was a free update for Outlaws distributed by LucasArts online. It included four single player levels (Wharf Town, Civil War, Spanish Villa and Ice Caves) as well as five multi-player levels (Bunkers, Buckshotville, Hargrove's Pattern Repair, Orleans and Thud's Tower).
